userreviews.userReview: Great book. Zombies in medieval times! Good atmosphere throughout the book and just the right length with a satisfying ending. Sequel is set to come out next year and i am looking forward to it.

description: Medieval life is hard enough with war, famine and pestilence a daily occurrence. But for one young messenger things are about to get a whole lot worse as plague of zombies arrives at the coast and rushes inland in an unstoppable tide of horror.
title: The Cursed Dead
